functionality: This endpoint runs up to 5 image searches in a single request and returns up to 20 results per search.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get suggestions for a search term
functionality: This endpoint provides autocomplete suggestions for partial search terms.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get keywords from text
functionality: This endpoint returns up to 10 important keywords from a block of plain text.
This endpoint lists the categories (Shutterstock-assigned genres) that images can belong to.
This endpoint returns images that are visually similar to an image that you specify.
This endpoint returns images that customers put in the same collection as the specified image IDs.
This endpoint lists images that have been updated in the specified time period to update content management systems (CMS) or
This endpoint lists information about one or more images, including the available sizes.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get details about images
functionality: This endpoint shows information about an image, including a URL to a preview image and the sizes that it is
This endpoint gets licenses for one or more images. You must specify the image IDs in the body parameter and
This endpoint lists existing licenses.
This endpoint redownloads images that you have already received a license for. The download links in the response are valid
This endpoint creates one or more image collections (lightboxes). To add images to the collections, use `POST /v2/images/collections/{id}/items`.
This endpoint lists your collections of images and their basic attributes.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the details of image collections
functionality: This endpoint gets more detailed information about a collection, including its cover image and timestamps for its creation and most
This endpoint sets a new name for an image collection.
This endpoint deletes an image collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Add images to collections
functionality: This endpoint adds one or more images to a collection by image IDs.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the contents of image collections
functionality: This endpoint lists the IDs of images in a collection and the date that each was added.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Remove images from collections
functionality: This endpoint removes one or more images from a collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: List featured image collections
functionality: This endpoint lists featured collections of specific types and a name and cover image for each collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the details of featured image collections
functionality: This endpoint gets more detailed information about a featured collection, including its cover image and timestamps for its creation and

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the contents of featured image collections
functionality: This endpoint lists the IDs of images in a featured collection and the date that each was added.
Deprecated; use `POST /v2/cv/images` instead. This endpoint uploads an image for reverse image search. The image must be in JPEG
This endpoint uploads an image for reverse image or video search. Images must be in JPEG or PNG format. To
This endpoint returns images that are visually similar to an image that you specify or upload.
This endpoint returns videos that are visually similar to an image that you specify or upload.
This endpoint returns a list of suggested keywords for a media item that you specify or upload.
This endpoint searches for videos. If you specify more than one search parameter, the API uses an AND condition. Array

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get suggestions for a search term
functionality: This endpoint provides autocomplete suggestions for partial search terms.
This endpoint searches for videos that are similar to a video that you specify.
This endpoint lists videos that have been updated in the specified time period to update content management systems (CMS) or
This endpoint lists information about one or more videos, including the aspect ratio and URLs to previews.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get details about videos
functionality: This endpoint shows information about a video, including URLs to previews and the sizes that it is available in.
This endpoint lists the categories (Shutterstock-assigned genres) that videos can belong to.
This endpoint gets licenses for one or more videos. You must specify the video IDs in the body parameter and
This endpoint lists existing licenses.
This endpoint redownloads videos that you have already received a license for.
This endpoint creates one or more collections (clipboxes). To add videos to collections, use `POST /v2/videos/collections/{id}/items`.
This endpoint lists your collections of videos and their basic attributes.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the details of video collections
functionality: This endpoint gets more detailed information about a collection, including the timestamp for its creation and the number of videos
This endpoint sets a new name for a collection.
This endpoint deletes a collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Add videos to collections
functionality: This endpoint adds one or more videos to a collection by video IDs.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the contents of video collections
functionality: This endpoint lists the IDs of videos in a collection and the date that each was added.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Remove videos from collections
functionality: This endpoint removes one or more videos from a collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: List featured video collections
functionality: This endpoint lists featured video collections and a name and cover video for each collection.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the details of featured video collections
functionality: This endpoint gets more detailed information about a featured video collection, including its cover video and timestamps for its creation

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the contents of featured video collections
functionality: This endpoint lists the IDs of videos in a featured collection and the date that each was added.
This endpoint searches for tracks. If you specify more than one search parameter, the API uses an AND condition. Array
This endpoint returns a list of all audio genres.
This endpoint returns a list of all audio instruments.
This endpoint returns a list of all audio moods.
This endpoint lists information about one or more audio tracks, including the description and publication date.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get details about audio tracks
functionality: This endpoint shows information about a track, including its genres, instruments, and other attributes.

This endpoint redownloads tracks that you have already received a license for. The download links in the response are valid

This endpoint lists your collections of audio tracks and their basic attributes.

This endpoint sets a new name for a collection.

functionality: This endpoint adds one or more tracks to a collection by track IDs.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Get the contents of audio collections
functionality: This endpoint lists the IDs of tracks in a collection and the date that each was added.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Remove audio tracks from collections
functionality: This endpoint removes one or more tracks from a collection.

This endpoint returns a list of catalog collections.
This endpoint creates a catalog collection and optionally adds assets. To add assets to the collection later, use `PATCH /v2/catalog/collections/{collection_id}/items`.
This endpoint updates the metadata of a catalog collection.
This endpoint deletes a catalog collection. It does not remove the assets from the user's account's catalog.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Add items to catalog collections
functionality: This endpoint adds assets to a catalog collection. It also automatically adds the assets to the user's account's catalog.

api_name: Shutterstock API: Remove items from catalog collection
functionality: This endpoint removes assets from a catalog collection. It does not remove the assets from the user's account's catalog.

api_name: Shutterstock API: List computer audio descriptors
functionality: This endpoint lists the descriptors that you can use in the audio regions in an audio render.

functionality: This endpoint lists information about one or more contributors, including contributor type, equipment they use and other attributes.

This endpoint returns a redirect URI (in the 'Location' header) that the customer uses to authorize your application and, together

urlencoded.description: (Required) Client ID (Consumer Key) of your application
(Required) Grant type: authorization_code generates user tokens, client_credentials generates short-lived client grants
Client Secret (Consumer Secret) of your application
Response code from the /oauth/authorize flow; required if grant_type=authorization_code
Whether or not the token expires, expiring tokens come with a refresh_token to renew the access_token
Pass this along with grant_type=refresh_token to get a fresh access token

functionality: This endpoint returns an access token for the specified user and with the specified scopes. The token does not expire
